question: A cubical Gaussian surface has side of length <katex>$a=10$</katex> cm. Electric field lines are parallel to x-axis as shown. Then the total charge enclosed by the cube is [Take <katex>$\epsilon_{0}=9\times10^{-12}Fm^{-1}$</katex>]
